titles.title: Global Fairness in Drug Pricing Act
Global Fairness in Drug Pricing Act
To reduce prescription drug prices by aligning U.S. prices with international benchmarks.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
